abstract: The entitlement that enables an app to vend other apps as an alternative app marketplace.
overview:
## Discussion

The system requires that your app have this entitlement to implement an app marketplace and install other apps using [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/MarketplaceKit]. Apple approves your use of this entitlement based on a set of criteria. To request the entitlement, see [https://developer.apple.com/support/alternative-app-marketplace-in-the-eu/]. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/appdistribution/creating-an-alternative-app-marketplace].

If your account receives this entitlement, provision your app with the entitlement according to: [https://developer.apple.com/help/account/reference/provisioning-with-managed-capabilities/].

# com.apple.developer.marketplace.app-installation

**Property List Key**

The entitlement that enables an app to vend other apps as an alternative app marketplace.

## Discussion

The system requires that your app have this entitlement to implement an app marketplace and install other apps using [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/MarketplaceKit]. Apple approves your use of this entitlement based on a set of criteria. To request the entitlement, see [https://developer.apple.com/support/alternative-app-marketplace-in-the-eu/]. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/appdistribution/creating-an-alternative-app-marketplace].

If your account receives this entitlement, provision your app with the entitlement according to: [https://developer.apple.com/help/account/reference/provisioning-with-managed-capabilities/].
title: com.apple.developer.marketplace.app-installation
